senses.sense_definition: A writer who writes short items or paragraphs, often for a newspaper.

examples.text: The <w>paragrapher</w> wrote a witty comment about local politics in the daily column.
He worked as a <w>paragrapher</w> for a small town newspaper before writing novels.

senses.sense_definition: A text or document that has a specific number or type of paragraphs.

examples.text: The assignment was a simple three-<w>paragrapher</w> describing our favorite hobby.
She wrote a quick <w>paragrapher</w> to explain the new office rules.
